thread.title: Rand Paul guilty of dumbest argument of 2016 campaign
thread.title_full: Rand Paul guilty of dumbest argument of 2016 campaign - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Rand Paul guilty of dumbest argument of 2016 campaign
text: To determine when a campaign is on the brink of extinction, the experts will usually cite lagging fundraising and sinking poll numbers as evidence the end is nigh. However, since I went to public school, I usually bypass all that technocratic stuff. Instead, I believe the deathly hallows looms for ... ...
